TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit IdentityReference extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Represents an identity and is the base class for the and classes. This class does not provide a public constructor, and therefore cannot be inherited.

Docs.param: The left operand to use for the inequality comparison. This parameter can be null.
The right operand to use for the inequality comparison. This parameter can be null.
Docs.summary: Compares two objects to determine whether they are not equal. They are considered not equal if they have different canonical name representations than the one returned by the property or if one of the objects is null and the other is not.
Docs.returns: true if left and right are not equal; otherwise, false.

remarks.format: The equivalent method for this operator is <xref:System.Security.Principal.IdentityReference.Equals%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
